channel.title: Maninblack144's amazing *cough* MSN annoy scripts! **UPDATED with DTM's**
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
This is my all new made-in-one-day script package to annoy your friends! They will all hate you after this!
This cool *cough* package contains the following: -A Awesome Unblocker/Blocker To Create The Imfamous Alert Tower! -A Awesome Flooder, Which Randomly Picks From 10 User-Defined Sentences, And Types Them At High Speed! -A Awesome Text Converter, Which Converts Your Text, While You Type, In 1337 Language! No Lag At All!!! -A Awesome Nudger! This Amazing Script Nudges Your Victim Every 16 Seconds, The Time It Takes For You To Be Able To Nudge Again!
**UPDATED** Now updated with DTM's, ofcourse all free of memory leaks of bad DTM's! Also updated with "case" command, for extra speed! Now works in almost any case! (<---wordjoke!!!)
You see, only awesomeness in this package! All with a build-in Instructions Section (Usually one line of text) and Explanation! And, there is a handy key to stop it almost instantly, the F8 key!
Have fun annoying your friends!

item.title: Maninblack144's amazing *cough* MSN annoy scripts! **UPDATED with DTM's**
item.dc:creator: @Maninblack144 Maninblack144
item.description:
@Maninblack144 wrote:

To XxKanexX:

Thanks for the comments. I haven’t actually mastered bitmaps yet, maybe I will try to learn it today
I knew that case command excisted, but I forgot it was pretty usefull. Thanks again.

To Martin:

This isn’t my first post about SCAR scripts. I have been active on freddy1990 forums and SRL-forums (great community, got replies to all my questions in 5-10 minutes). I saw a reference to this forum and I took a look. And I like it
BTW, what do you mean with “non-spammy”?

EDIT:
So, I’ve just mastered Bitmaps and DTM’s. I am going to update all my scripts now.

EDIT Mark II:
They are all updated now. Check the first post ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Maninblack144's amazing *cough* MSN annoy scripts! **UPDATED with DTM's**
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

With your unblocker all it does is move the mouse to the location on YOUR screen where the block icon is. On other peoples screens it may be different. Try using Bitmaps or DTM’s to locate it better.

     rnumber:=random(types);
     if (rnumber=0) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst1 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=1) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst2 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=2) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst3 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=3) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst4 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=4) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst5 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=5) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst6 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=6) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst7 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=7) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst8 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=8) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst9 + chr(13));
     end;
     if (rnumber=9) then
     begin
          SendKeys(tekst10 + chr(13));
     end;

Try using “case”
Example:

rnumber:= Random(types);
case rnumber of
  0: SendKeys(tekst1 + Chr(13));
  1: SendKeys(tekst2 + Chr(13));
end;

And so on…

And again with the nudge one, use Bitmaps or DTM’s.
Keep trying!

Read full topic
